timeline.message: Try to initialize GoogleMaps when the app is installed
Try to initialize MapBox when the app is installed

timeline.bodyText:
I know the fix for Mapbox doesn't look good you would probably ask: can't we do the same what works for Google: 647dc72?
Unfortunately we can't we need to display that map even if it's not visible like in this case to make sure getMapAsync and then setStyle is called. Only then MapBox is initialized properly and we can use it offline.
